description: With just a prompt, Alexa will tell you one of many random quotes from some of Christianity's greatest theological minds, including quotes from N. T. Wright, Charles Spurgeon, Oswald Chambers, John Wesley, Leonard Sweet, Shane Claiborne, C.S. Lewis, and more!
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Theology Quotes for a quote
Alexa, ask Theology Quotes to tell me a quote
name: Theology Quotes
shortDescription: This skill will deliver a random quote from some of Christianity's greatest theological minds, new and old.
